meanings.definition: To give an account of something in words.
meanings.sent1: She is describing her favorite book to her friend.
meanings.sent2: The teacher is describing the rules of the game to the students.
meanings.sent3: He kept describing the movie plot in a funny voice.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a painter describing a beautiful landscape.
meanings.sent5: The tour guide was vividly describing the historical site to the visitors.

meanings.definition: To draw or trace the outline of something.
meanings.sent1: The artist is describing the shape of the tree on the canvas.
meanings.sent2: She is describing the map of the treasure island for the pirate party.
meanings.sent3: The child was describing funny faces on the foggy window.
meanings.sent4: His pencil moved swiftly, describing the curves of the racing car.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor was describing the statue's features with precision.

meanings.definition: To represent or characterize in words.
meanings.sent1: The author is describing the main character's personality in the novel.
meanings.sent2: They are describing the taste of the dish in their food blog.
meanings.sent3: The comedian was describing the audience's reactions in a hilarious way.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a poet describing the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent5: The journalist was describing the event with vivid details.
